EmailTemplate.subject: Integrated chronic condition management
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Multiple conditions drive exponential costs Chronic conditions do not exist in isolation. Neither should your benefits programs. We work with over 28 health plans around the country, and two of the nation’s top pharmacy benefit managers, to ensure our solutions work for you and your members—and at scale. Our chronic care management solutions complement your current benefits offering through your health plan to address the many challenges and costs associated with managing chronic conditions. This means better clinical outcomes for members and cost savings for members and employers. Our Chronic Care Management Solutions offer - Effortless data collection - Personalized health signals - A human-centered approach About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
